sqlMap.select: SELECT ADMIN_DIM_ID as adminDimId, STUDENT_DIM_ID as studentDimId, STUDENT_DIM_VERSION_ID as studentDimVersionId, PREDICTED_GED_READING as expectedGedReading, PREDICTED_GED_WRITING as expectedGedWriting, PREDICTED_GED_SOCIAL_STUDIES as expectedGedSocialStudies, PREDICTED_GED_SCIENCE as expectedGedScience, PREDICTED_GED_MATHEMATICS as expectedGedMath, PREDICTED_GED_AVERAGE as expectedGedAverage, VALID_SCORE as validScore FROM STUDENT_PREDICTED_SCORES WHERE STUDENT_DIM_ID = #studentDimId:NUMERIC# AND ADMIN_DIM_ID = #adminDimId:NUMERIC#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO STUDENT_PREDICTED_SCORES ( ADMIN_DIM_ID, STUDENT_DIM_ID, STUDENT_DIM_VERSION_ID, PREDICTED_GED_READING, PREDICTED_GED_WRITING, PREDICTED_GED_SOCIAL_STUDIES, PREDICTED_GED_SCIENCE, PREDICTED_GED_MATHEMATICS, PREDICTED_GED_AVERAGE, VALID_SCORE ) VALUES ( #adminDimId:NUMERIC#, #studentDimId:NUMERIC#, #studentDimVersionId:NUMERIC#, #expectedGedReading:NUMERIC#, #expectedGedWriting:NUMERIC#, #expectedGedSocialStudies:NUMERIC#, #expectedGedScience:NUMERIC#, #expectedGedMath:NUMERIC#, #expectedGedAverage:NUMERIC#, #validScore:VARCHAR# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE STUDENT_PREDICTED_SCORES SET PREDICTED_GED_READING = #expectedGedReading:NUMERIC#, PREDICTED_GED_WRITING = #expectedGedWriting:NUMERIC#, PREDICTED_GED_SOCIAL_STUDIES = #expectedGedSocialStudies:NUMERIC#, PREDICTED_GED_SCIENCE = #expectedGedScience:NUMERIC#, PREDICTED_GED_MATHEMATICS = #expectedGedMath:NUMERIC#, PREDICTED_GED_AVERAGE = #expectedGedAverage:NUMERIC#, VALID_SCORE = #validScore:VARCHAR#, STUDENT_DIM_VERSION_ID = #studentDimVersionId:NUMERIC# WHERE STUDENT_DIM_ID = #studentDimId:NUMERIC# AND ADMIN_DIM_ID = #adminDimId:NUMERIC#
